verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Heaven and earth adore you
Angels bow before you
Singing glory to th king
Lamb upon the throne
We lift holy hands in worship
And we give all the praise
Alpha and Omega
The beginning and the end

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I give you all the glory
I give you all the honour
I give you all the worship
You deserve the praise
I give you all the glory
Adoration to your name
You deserve it all
You deserve it all
